channel.title: Weapon pricing
channel.description: I was looking at the GE yesterday. In short, how come abyssal whips are so cheap? Even three of the godswords and the saradomin sword are ridiculously cheap now. Did they release new stuff?

item.title: Weapon pricing
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:4, topic:532203”]New items have been around for ages now though drubrkletern. Namely the chaotic weapons. But the prices always stayed high on most of the 70+ attack weapons because you need dungeoneering to acquire the chaotic stuff.

I just found it curious that the price of a whip had fallen to less than the value of dragon weaponry from the store.[/quote]
Lol I was like ‘‘wtf’’ when I did read that ‘‘dumbledore’’ … Until u said in next sentence something about chaotics<_<…

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon pricing
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Whips are also pretty atrocious after the EoC update

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon pricing
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:13, topic:532203”][quote author=Shane link=topic=650994.msg4367996#msg4367996 date=1380058564]

So when does slayer become highly profitable now? Even dark bows at level 90 are just another junk drop now.
It looks like they’ve managed to turn slayer into the next smithing. I’m surprised they’ve made that mistake twice, but here we are.

This…
[/quote]Yeaaap yeap[/quote]

Sadly.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon pricing
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:4, topic:532203”]New items have been around for ages now though drubrkletern. Namely the chaotic weapons. But the prices always stayed high on most of the 70+ attack weapons because you need dungeoneering to acquire the chaotic stuff.

I just found it curious that the price of a whip had fallen to less than the value of dragon weaponry from the store.[/quote]

All Drygores (including off-hands) are above 35m. They’ve come down a bit though as well. But another reason of why melee weapons have dropped is because of magic too. The Seismic wand is 617m and the Seismic singularity is 394m GE price. No clue about street price though.

Read full topic

item.description:

Combat is hardly profitable anymore aside from the high level bosses.

[quote=“Lothy, post:7, topic:532203”]So when does slayer become highly profitable now? Even dark bows at level 90 are just another junk drop now.
It looks like they’ve managed to turn slayer into the next smithing. I’m surprised they’ve made that mistake twice, but here we are.[/quote]valid comment

You can still make some decent cash from slayer but it’s all the drops overall that make it up.

So when does slayer become highly profitable now? Even dark bows at level 90 are just another junk drop now.
It looks like they’ve managed to turn slayer into the next smithing. I’m surprised they’ve made that mistake twice, but here we are.

item.title: Weapon pricing
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Bots. Abbysal demons were always heavily botted and now there is far less demand for lower tier weapons when there are better equivalents. Whips recently dropped just below alch price which is pretty depressing

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon pricing
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

The main reason for the whips price fall would probably be just eoc then, it has lost a lot of the use it had beforehand

item.title: Weapon pricing
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

New items have been around for ages now though drubrkletern. Namely the chaotic weapons. But the prices always stayed high on most of the 70+ attack weapons because you need dungeoneering to acquire the chaotic stuff.

I just found it curious that the price of a whip had fallen to less than the value of dragon weaponry from the store.
